articles.title: When Cells Collide: The Making of an Organic Particle Experiment with Rapier & Three.js

articles.title: What Can We Actually Do With corner-shape?
articles.author: CSS-Tricks
articles.description: Revisiting the evolution of rounded corners, from multiple background images to the simplicity of border-radius, highlighting what we can now achieve with modern CSS.

description: Dive into the art of creating dynamic and accessible web experiences with insights on CSS composability, strategic UX patterns, and the evolution of style techniques. Explore how modern CSS features enhance your toolkit and learn to streamline stylesheets while troubleshooting common CSS issues. Gain valuable tips on integrating accessibility into your designs for a more inclusive web.
joke: Why did the JavaScript developer go broke? Because he used up all his cache!
challenge: Create an interactive particle simulation using HTML Canvas and JavaScript. Your task is to simulate cellular movement, allowing users to manipulate variables like speed and size through a user-friendly interface. Add a twist by making particles react to mouse movements or sound input, offering an engaging and educational exploration of physics on the web.
